echoconda 0.99.0

echoconda: Getting Started

Author: Brian M. Schilder

Most recent update: Aug-30-2021

Source: vignettes/echoconda.Rmd
echoconda.Rmd
library(echoconda)

Activate conda env

activate_env(conda_env = "echoR")
## + CONDA:: Activating conda env 'echoR'

Find package path

tabix <- find_package(package = "tabix", conda_env = "echoR")
## + CONDA:: Identified tabix executable in echoR env.
print(tabix)
## [1] "/opt/anaconda3/envs/echoR/bin/tabix"

Find python path

python <- find_python_path(conda_env = "echoR")
print(python)
## [1] "/opt/anaconda3/envs/echoR/bin/python"
